statements: SELECT * FROM example_table;
SELECT id, biometric_template FROM example_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT encryption_key FROM example_table WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM example_table ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, biometric_template FROM example_table WHERE encryption_key = 'sample';
SELECT id, encryption_key, biometric_template FROM example_table WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM example_table WHERE encryption_key LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM example_table WHERE id > 5 AND encryption_key IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM example_table WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6) OR encryption_key = 'qwerty'
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM example_table WHERE biometric_template IS NULL
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, key FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM authentication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key LIKE 'abc%';
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE success = true ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT key, biometric_template FROM encryption_keys WHERE key LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM authentication_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT template_id, template_data FROM biometric_templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT auth_id, user_id, key_id, template_id FROM authentication_info WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value LIKE '%secret%' ORDER BY key_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT template_id, template_data FROM biometric_templates WHERE template_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM authentication_info WHERE key_id = 3 AND template_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(auth_id) AS auth_count FROM authentication_info GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM biometric_templates;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE biometric_template_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, biometric_data FROM biometric_templates ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM authentication_logs WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE biometric_template_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 10 AND success = true;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM authentication_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_data FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM biometric_templates;
SELECT template_id, template_data FROM biometric_templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE auth_status = true;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT key_id, key_data FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id > 100 ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT template_id, template_data FROM biometric_templates WHERE template_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
